1221 - Bituminous Coal and Lignite Surface Mining Summary > FITZROY AUSTRALIA RESOURCES PTY LTD is an Australian proprietary company. Its operations cover coal mining services. The company is not involved in the import or export of goods. FITZROY AUSTRALIA RESOURCES PTY LTD is headquartered in Brisbane, Queensland. It is headed by chief executive officer & director Anne Bernadine Mcintyre. For the 2023 financial year, the company reported revenue of $34.86 million. Its net loss totalled $21.04 million. FITZROY AUSTRALIA RESOURCES PTY LTD forms part of the mining industry sector. Key Personnel > No key personnel were found for the selected company.
